text.autoconfig.waymoreicons.option.pref: Attempt to use the non-default GPU for rendering

This option is only effective if you have a system with multiple GPUs, such as a laptop with an integrated GPU and a dedicated GPU. Enabling this option will attempt to use the non-default GPU for rendering, which may improve performance in some cases.
text.autoconfig.waymoreicons.option.cust: Full path to custom icon file
